data.title: Who We Are — Focal Studios
data.meta_description: Focal Studios is a multidisciplinary Creative Studio specialising in projection mapping, animation and video production.
data.text:
Based in Merseyside, UK, our interdisciplinary team offer bespoke and turnkey solutions to creative and technical projects. Our mission is to democratise technology and use our built environment to engage, inspire and tell the true stories of our communities.

Focal Studios specialises in creating immersive visual experiences. Our team fully invests in the vision of our clients by harnessing the power of technology to bring their stories to life.

Our expertise in projection mapping, spatial augmented reality, immersive and interactive installations can turn our partner’s message into engaging and effective visual content.

Using our holistic creative process and innovative products, we create a new reality for audiences by designing systems and content that imbues environments with marvellous audiovisual experiences.

Our team members are self-motivated and passionate professionals who love their craft and live and breathe immersive media. As a highly personable team from diverse backgrounds, we take pride in the level of preparation and resources we provide in our work with all sectors.

We encourage our team to expand their knowledge and regularly engage in professional practices that build upon our existing skillsets.

We develop products and services that creatively and technically innovate in both our personal development and in the wider sector.

We offer end-to-end solutions for all aspects of your project. In addition to being technology and creative experts, we take pride in producing bespoke content covering a range of immersive platforms that reflects your vision and identity.

Our immersive solutions bring your vision to the forefront of viewers minds, transporting them to the space in which your story exists. Our interactive systems are able to respond and interact in real-time with the people who choose to participate; encouraging further engagement and deeper exploration.

We are a member of Shift Liverpool - the sustainability network for the Liverpool City Region’s cultural sector.

As a network we want to collaboratively address the climate emergency and the Liverpool City Region’s ambitious 2040 zero-carbon target.

Together we can share knowledge, resources, and create new initiatives to benefit the whole sector.

By signing the pledge our organisation has committed to improving the environmental sustainability of our day-to-day operations and promising to:

Use the network to help develop knowledge and practices to help it reach carbon neutrality;

Become a more environmentally sustainable and regenerative organisation
